snippet.title: Preface: Undiscovered World Early Access Trailer - PC Gamer Live: Most Wanted
snippet.description:
Download for free on Steam: https://preface.pp.studio

Preface is a tech demo developed by PLAYERUNKNOWN Productions to demonstrate Melba, our in-house world-generation engine currently in development. This demo provides users with an opportunity to experience real-time terrain generation at Earth-scale (510,000,000 km² or 200,000,000 sq mi) directly on their GPU, using machine learning techniques with no reliance on cloud services.

Discover Prologue: Prologue YT Video Link

Join the Community: https://go.pp.studio/Discord 

More on Preface: https://go.pp.studio/PrefaceLaunchArticle
